oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Levee at Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sketches; riverfront; levees; steamboats; 1860s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "The Levee at Memphis, Tenn. - Hauling Sugar and Cotton from their Hiding Places for Shipment North." Appears on cover of Harper's Weekly from July 5, 1862.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Simplot, Alex
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly Newspaper and Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper
